tasks.title: tasks
tasks.description: All tasks which can be run by FlexGet are defined in this section

run_v2.deprecationMessage: v2 is registered by default if web_ui: true so `run_v2` is now redundant. To run v1 alongside, use the `run_v1`.

items.error_pattern: channel name must start with # or & and contain no commas and whitespace
items.title: single value

oneOf.error_pattern: channel name must start with # or & and contain no commas and whitespace
oneOf.title: single value

allOf.error: Must specify a tracker file or server and channel(s)

schedules.title: scheduler
schedules.description: Runs tasks periodically (when FlexGet is run as a daemon)

items.title: schedule
items.description: A schedule which runs specified tasks periodically

interval.title: Simple Interval
interval.error_anyOf: Interval must be specified as one or more of minutes, hours, days, weeks

plugins?interface=task.error_additionalProperties: {{message}} Only known plugin names are valid keys.

clean_transmission.deprecationMessage: The clean_transmission plugin is deprecated. Configure a new task using the from_transmission plugin as well as the transmission plugin using the remove or purge action.

oneOf.description: Apply multiple templates to this task.
Apply a single template to this task.
Disable all templates on this task.

template.description: Name of a template which will be applied to this task.

limit.deprecationMessage: The `limit` option of from_digest is deprecated. Use the `limit` plugin instead.

manual.title: manual
manual.description: Prevents this task from running unless it is explicitly specified with --tasks, or in a schedule

allOf.error_maxProperties: Plugin options within inputs plugin must be indented 2 more spaces than the first letter of the plugin name.

user_id.error_pattern: user_id must be in the form XXXXXXX

login.description: Can be username or email address

min_star.description: Items will be processed with at least this level of "How much I want to see"

flags.error_pattern: Must be a comma separated list of flags. See python regex docs.

backfill_limit.description: If the gap between episodes is larger than this limit, they will not be emitted.

message.default: {% if series_name is defined %}{{ tvdb_series_name|d(series_name) }} {{series_id}} {{tvdb_ep_name|d()}}{% elif imdb_name is defined %}{{imdb_name}} {{imdb_year}}{% elif title is defined %}{{ title }}{% endif %}
